峉字的基本解释

峉
é
〔峉峉〕（山）高大的样子。

峉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
［《廣韻》五陌切，入陌，疑。］
亦作“1”。
(1)山高大貌。参见“峉峉”。
(2)见“岝峉”。

峉字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峉； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页310第11
【廣韻】五陌切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】鄂格切，?音頟。山高大貌。【楚辭·九思】山峊兮峉峉。　又【埤倉】山不齊貌。【嵆康·琴賦】岝峉嶇崯。或作㟯。　又【集韻】亦作?。【木華·海賦】啓龍門之岝?。

峉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
峉字的起名意思

山高大的样子。

峉
Basic explanation of words
峉
é
〔峉峉〕(Mountain) looks tall.
峉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [è]
["Guangyun" Five Moss Cuts, Entering Mos, Doubts. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) The mountains are tall and magnificent. See "峉峉".
(2) See "Ao峉".
峉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峉; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 310 Page 11
[Guang Yun] Five Moss Cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] E Geqi,? Yin Yun. The mountains are tall and magnificent. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Thoughts] The mountains are beautiful.　[Picang] The mountain is not uniform. 【Songkang·Qin Fu】Aoqiukuao. Or make 㟯.　[Jiyun] also made?. 【Muhua·Haifu】Qilongmen's 岝?.
